metadata.name: BAD MORNING by Shark Anthony
metadata.description: BAD MORNING is a song about rough starts & triumphant finishes. When I wrote this song, I wanted to make something that could capture the feeling of leaving what you love behind to chase your dreams, while also riding the highs & lows of the journey. This song is that reassurance youâ€™ll make it thru with the energy to bounce back from anything. Written, recorded, produced, mixed, mastered, and designed by myself, Shark Anthony. The cover art is a young zombie representation of me, sporting that classic bucket hat look in a vector art style. The art was created in collaboration with AI using Stable Diffusion & my own digital art post-processing techniques. Feel free to reach out on a variety of social media platforms to learn more about this digital edition of the music single. All rights reserved.
